Tankor: Good renewal, ambassador...

He activates the chamber and slowly starts to walk out of the room.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> ooC: Heh, sounds good. =)
> 
> -- Firedrill --
> 
> Firedrill sighs, and nods. He gets into the coffinlike bed aka the 
> renewal chamber, and lies down. "Ok, press the button."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tankor: You see that coffin-like bed over there? That's a renewal 
> > chamber. Get in and tell me when you're ready. You'll start 
> feeling 
> > numb and then you'll fall asleep as soon as I push the trigger.
> > 
> > OOC: He can even come out reformatted... hint hint!
